article:
In one's life, one spends the most time being oneself. But one has the _ understanding of oneself. When you are successful, you may be very proud. When you fail , you may lose heart. If you don't get a fully understanding of yourself, you may miss many chances in life.
 To get a fully understanding of yourself is to know well about yourself. You may realize your strong points and weak ones . You may hope for a wonderful future, but be sure not to expect too much _ not all dreams can come true. You may be confident enough to meet challenges , but first you should know what to do.
To get a fully understanding of yourself needs self-confidence. Maybe you think you are a tall tree or just small grass, but can always have your own way of being there.
To get a fully understanding of yourself also means taking care of yourself. When you are angry, find a quiet place so that you won't be hurt .
No one can tell _ will happen in the future. Get a fully understanding of yourself, and you will get a full control of yourself and find your life  full of color.
